name: Ansible
description: This task executes an Ansible playbook using a specified inventory via command line interface
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ansibleInterface
inputs.label: Ansible location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if Ansible automation engine is installed on a private Linux agent machine or on a remote machine.

inputs.name: connectionOverSsh
inputs.label: Ansible SSH endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Ansible communicates with remote machines over SSH. Select the SSH endpoint to be used to run the Ansible playbook

inputs.name: playbookSourceRemoteMachine
inputs.label: Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select agent machine if playbook is part of a linked artifact and should be copied to the Ansible machine. Otherwise, select Ansible machine.

inputs.name: playbookRootRemoteMachine
inputs.label: Root
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the working directory path where playbook and associated files are located on the agent machine. All the files in this folder will be copied to Ansible machine.

inputs.name: playbookPathLinkedArtifactOnRemoteMachine
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the playbook file to be executed on the Ansible machine relative to root path. [Playbooks](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/playbooks.html) declare Ansible’s configuration, deployment, and orchestration steps in YAML format.

inputs.name: playbookPathAnsibleMachineOnRemoteMachine
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the playbook file to be executed on the Ansible machine. [Playbooks](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/playbooks.html) declare Ansible’s configuration, deployment, and orchestration steps in YAML format.

inputs.name: playbookPathOnAgentMachine
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the playbook file to be executed on the Ansible machine. [Playbooks](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/playbooks.html) declare Ansible’s configuration, deployment, and orchestration steps in YAML format.

inputs.name: inventoriesRemoteMachine
inputs.label: Inventory location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the source of Ansible's [inventory](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/intro_inventory.html)

inputs.name: inventoryFileSourceRemoteMachine
inputs.label: File source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if the location of [inventory](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/intro_inventory.html) file is on agent machine or Ansible machine

inputs.name: inventoryFileLinkedArtifactOnRemoteMachine
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to [inventory](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/intro_inventory.html) host file on agent machine.

inputs.name: inventoryFileAnsibleMachineOnRemoteMachine
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to [inventory](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/intro_inventory.html) host file on Ansible machine

inputs.name: inventoryHostListRemoteMachine
inputs.label: Host list
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a list of comma separated hosts. Example - foo.example.com, bar.example.com. If you have hosts that run on non-standard SSH ports you can put the port number after the hostname with a colon.

inputs.name: inventoryInlineDynamicRemoteMachine
inputs.label: Dynamic inventory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this box if [dynamic inventory](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/intro_dynamic_inventory.html) is used.

inputs.name: inventoryInlineContentRemoteMachine
inputs.label: Content
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify [inventory](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/intro_inventory.html) inline

inputs.name: inventoriesAgentMachine
inputs.label: Inventory location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the source of [inventory](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/intro_inventory.html)

inputs.name: inventoryFileOnAgentMachine
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to [inventory](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/intro_inventory.html)  host file on agent machine.

inputs.name: inventoryHostListAgentMachine
inputs.label: Host list
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a list of comma separated hosts. Example - foo.example.com, bar.example.com. If you have hosts that run on non-standard SSH ports you can put the port number after the hostname with a colon.

inputs.name: inventoryInlineDynamicAgentMachine
inputs.label: Dynamic inventory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this box if [dynamic inventory](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/intro_dynamic_inventory.html) is used.

inputs.name: inventoryInlineContentAgentMachine
inputs.label: Content
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify [inventory](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/intro_inventory.html) inline

inputs.name: sudoEnabled
inputs.label: Sudo
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run operations with sudo. It works only when the Ansible user is sudoer with nopasswd option.

inputs.name: sudoUser
inputs.label: Sudo user
inputs.helpMarkDown: Desired sudo user. "root" is used when this field is empty.

inputs.name: args
inputs.label: Additional parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any additional parameters to pass to the Ansible command. The content of this textbox will be passed as is to the command line

inputs.name: failOnStdErr
inputs.label: Fail on STDERR
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this option is selected, the task will fail when the remote commands or script write to STDERR.

inputs.name: connectionAnsibleTower
inputs.label: Tower endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Ansible Tower server endpoint

inputs.name: jobTemplateName
inputs.label: Job Template Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments to pass to the shell script.

messages.UseDefaultPort: Using port 22 which is the default for SSH since no port was specified.
messages.SettingUpSshConnection: Trying to setup SSH connection to %s@%s:%s
messages.ConnectionFailed: Failed to connect to Ansible machine. Verify the SSH endpoint details. Error: %s.
messages.RemoteCopyFailed: Failed to copy script to Ansible machine. Error: %s.
messages.RemoteCmdExecutionErr: Command failed with errors on Ansible machine.
messages.RemoteFileCleanUpFailed: Failed to delete the script file copied to the Ansible machine. Error: %s.
messages.JobTemplateNotPresent: Failed to locate job template. Job template with name %s is not present.
messages.FailedToGetJobDetails: Failed to get job details. Ansible returns with error code %s and message %s.
messages.CouldnotLaunchJob: Failed to launch job. Ansible returns with error code %s and message %s.
messages.AgentOnWindowsMachine: Both agent and Ansible should be on linux machine
messages.AnisbleNotPresent: Could not locate Ansible. Either it is not installed or its path is not present on ENVIRONMENT PATH variable
messages.PlaybookRootNotDirectory: Playbook root %s should be a directory
messages.PlaybookNotPresent: Playbook file %s doesn't exist inside playbook root directory %s
